VIEW_SOURCE: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `v1_penerimaan_barang_rekening` AS select `a`.`Id` AS `Id`,`a`.`k` AS `k`,`a`.`l` AS `l`,`a`.`m` AS `m`,`a`.`n` AS `n`,`a`.`o` AS `o`,`a`.`jumlah` AS `jumlah`,`a`.`refid_terima` AS `refid_terima`,`a`.`status` AS `status`,`a`.`uid` AS `uid`,`a`.`sttemp` AS `sttemp`,`a`.`tgl_create` AS `tgl_create`,`a`.`tgl_update` AS `tgl_update`,`a`.`tahun` AS `tahun`,`b`.`nm_rekening` AS `nm_rekening`,`c`.`jns_trans` AS `jns_trans`,`c`.`c1` AS `c1`,`c`.`c` AS `c`,`c`.`d` AS `d`,`c`.`e` AS `e`,`c`.`e1` AS `e1`,`c`.`asal_usul` AS `asal_usul`,`c`.`sumber_dana` AS `sumber_dana`,`c`.`tgl_buku` AS `tgl_buku`,`c`.`sttemp` AS `sttemp_penerimaan` from ((`t_penerimaan_rekening` `a` left join `ref_rekening` `b` on(((`a`.`k` = `b`.`k`) and (`a`.`l` = `b`.`l`) and (`a`.`m` = `b`.`m`) and (`a`.`n` = `b`.`n`) and (`a`.`o` = `b`.`o`)))) left join `t_penerimaan_barang` `c` on((`a`.`refid_terima` = `c`.`Id`)))
